author: robzajac
content:
Hey, I was wondering how folks contributing to consensus clients are testing their changes in goerli/mainnet?
I've been testing teku changes on a local testnet, but I think to run goerli/main I would need to sync an EL client to pair with teku, and I'm afraid I don't really have the hardware for that

author: sproul
content: I have a shared mainnet execution node running openexecution that I’ve given my mentees access to. The Teku team may have something similar, or you can DM me and I’ll give you access to our node (run by SigP).
